endpoints.description: CIRCL Passive SSL is a database storing historical X.509 certificates seen per IP address. Query values can be IP addresses or CIDR blocks between /32 up to /23.
endpoints.name: Passive SSL query

endpoints.description: CIRCL Passive SSL is a database storing historical X.509 certificates seen per IP address. The X509 certificate can be requested by its fingerprint and the raw certificate will be returned, including its readable output:
endpoints.name: Passive SSL Fetch

endpoints.description: CIRCL Passive SSL is a database storing historical X.509 certificates seen per IP address. Query value in cquery is the SHA1 fingerprint of a certificate and returns a list of seen IP addresses for the requested certificate.
endpoints.name: Passive SSL cquery

endpoints.description: CIRCL Passive DNS is a database storing historical DNS records from various resources including malware analysis or partners
endpoints.name: Passive dns

info.description: The Computer Incident Response Center Luxembourg (CIRCL) is a government-driven initiative designed to provide a systematic response facility to computer security threats and incidents.
info.name: Circl
